document_data.name: Seldinor Stormcloak
document_data.deathnotes: (Killed by his own [[golem]]){{Cite dragon/228/The Athalantan Campaign|30}}
document_data.mainbody: '''Seldinor Stormcloak''' was a male [[magelord]] who was one of the most powerful magelords of [[Athalantar]].
document_data.Description: As a tall man, Seldinor was attractive and extremely charismatic.
document_data.Personality: He had a retinue of apprentices and one of his favorite fields of study was the creation of [[golem]]s.
document_data.Relationships: Seldinor was a powerful member of the magelords from the start of their power, second only to [[Neldryn Hawklyn]] together with [[Kadeln Olothstar]].
document_data.History: Around [[240 DR]], the magelord had his head torn off by his own [[golem]] with the help of [[Elminster Aumar]] and [[Mystra|Myrjala Talithyn]].
